hu.elte.eserial.model

Class EserialContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • hu.elte.eserial.model.EserialContext

  • public class EserialContext
extends java.lang.Object
    Stores information about an element: its corresponding field, getter, containing class. Also contains a recursion checker instance to use during the serialization process.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods

      static EserialContext forRoot(java.lang.Object object)
      Constructs an EserialContext from a root object and creates a RecursionChecker for it, too.

      • forElement

        public static EserialContext forElement(java.lang.Object object,
                                        java.lang.String getterName,
                                        RecursionChecker recursionChecker)
        Constructs an EserialContext from a containing object, a getter's name and a recursion checker.
        Parameters:
        object - the containing object of the element which the context is built for
        getterName - the name of the getter in the object's class
        recursionChecker - a RecursionChecker instance
        Returns:
        An EserialContext with its field, getter, containing class and recursion checker set.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if object is null

      • forRoot

        public static EserialContext forRoot(java.lang.Object object)
        Constructs an EserialContext from a root object and creates a RecursionChecker for it, too.
        Parameters:
        object - a root object
        Returns:
        An EserialContext with its containing class and recursion checker set.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if object is null
